elements.text: You are in the passenger seat as your partner drives to a new friend's house. They struggle, and the trip goes from 15 to 30 minutes, making you irritated. When your partner eventually stops the car and apologizes for getting lost, you give them...

elements.name: Navigation Irritation_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
